    • Constructor Detail

      • Asteroid

        public Asteroid(int variety,
                int size,
                double x,
                double y,
                int speed,
                Controller controller)
        Throws an IllegalArgumentException if size or variety is out of range. Creates an asteroid of the specified variety (0 through 3) and size (0 = small, 1 = medium, 2 = large) and positions it at the provided coordinates with a random rotation. Its velocity has the given speed but is in a random direction.

    • Method Detail

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns the size of the asteroid

        When an Asteroid collides with an AsteroidDestroyer, it expires.
